Tinder swindler: Kiwi divorcee loses $580k in 14-month romance scam after falling in love with US oil rig worker https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tinder-swindler-divorced-kiwi-woman-loses-580k-in-14-month-romance-scam-after-falling-in-love-with-us-石油钻井工人/PADSZFF4KBAONHQXDQBG5RRRJU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tinder-swindler-divorced-kiwi-woman-loses-580k-in-14-month-romance-scam-after-falling-in-love-with-us-石油钻井工人/PADSZFF4KBAONHQXDQBG5RRRJU/ Lane NicholsThe victim was sent log in details to a fake UK bank account showing a balance of $3m. Fri, 24 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The scammer claimed he was a petroleum engineer named Scott Thomas working on an oil rig off the Canadian coast. However, the victim's family now believe the photos he sent and elaborate back story were all fake.
